entry.title: Office Hours 2020-04-01
entry.summary: In our todays office hours, we discussed the following topics
entry.content:
In our todays office hours, we discussed the following topics

  1. News from the DevSecOps Team
  2. News from the Security Team (e.g. our new tooling)
  3. Hands-On

You find the recording here
